mean_cn: n. 公平，公正，衡平法，普通股，抵押资产的净值
mean_en: the value of a piece of property (such as a house) after any debts that remain to be paid for it (such as the amount of a mortgage) have been subtracted
word_etyma: equi相等，平均+ty名词后缀 → 公平，公正
sentence: It is important to establish equity so that we could be treated with justice.
sentence_trans: 公平的确立很重要，只有这样我们才能被公正的对待。
